Main Window Interface

14
15
16

1. Color code and priority column. Click to sort by priority
2. Item Color code and priority. Right-Click to quickly change this parameters, Double click to modify item
3. Folder. Click to expand or collapse, right-click for more actions (like "Rename")
4. Item (ToDo/Note/Reminder or link) status icon (Done/not done for ToDos and active/inactive for reminders)
5. Item title. Double click to edit, right-click to call context menu. Hold mouse to get extended information about item
6. Title column. Click to sort by title
7. Item modification date. Double click to modify item
8. Modification date column. Click to sort by date
9. OnTop button. Useful when you want to drag file link from other application
10. "Save all" button
11. Open "Preferences" dialog
12. Address book
13. Show/Hide lower pane
14. New ToDo
15. New note
16. New reminder
